hooks.command: fp=$(cat | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty') && [ -n "$fp" ] && case "$fp" in */fzf-tmux|*/yarn.lock|*/.yarn/*) echo "BLOCKED: $fp is a vendor/lock file â€” do not edit directly" >&2; exit 2;; esac; exit 0

fp=$(cat | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty') && [ -n "$fp" ] && [ -f "$fp" ] && case "$fp" in *.sh|*/bin/*) head -1 "$fp" | grep -qE '^#!.*(ba)?sh' && command -v shfmt > /dev/null && shfmt -i 2 -bn -ci -sr -fn -w "$fp";; esac; exit 0
fp=$(cat | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty') && [ -n "$fp" ] && [ -f "$fp" ] && case "$fp" in *.fish) command -v fish_indent > /dev/null && fish_indent -w "$fp";; esac; exit 0
